extendedInfo.description: The United States Constitution for Android. This includes the new Android Holo theme, and can be customized to either Holo Light or the standard dark theme. Have all of your guaranteed rights, in the palm of your hand!Features:- Full US Constitution- Several other similar documents: The articles of confederation, the declaration of independence, the english bill of rights, and the magna carta- Failed amendments- Ability to quickly jump to wikipedia, google search, or the official page for each item- Move to SD CardAdditions or corrections readily welcomed. Thanks for the support!

reviews.title: No permissions
reviews.comment: This is the first app I\'ve ever seen that doesn\'t require permissions. I\'m pretty sure freedom from permissions is not a constitutional guarantee, but it\'s a nice touch. God bless Amurrica! You\'d have a winner if you allowed different font sizes and added a search function. I can forgive our Founding Fathers for not making the original Constitution searchable, but not this dev. Sorry.
reviews.author: Nicholas Whipps

reviews.title: Not quite sure
reviews.comment: I downloaded it because of the no special permission. But when I open it with no other apps going my network activity doesn\'t stop. Nice interface. Reads comfortably. Not searchable.
reviews.author: D Ninesling

reviews.title: Text is too small in comparsion
reviews.comment: In comparasion to other apps like this one if fails jy good visual test.  This a simple and easy to use app, I like it but not going to keep it
reviews.author: David Blakeman

reviews.title: Titles of Nobility
reviews.comment: The new version is ugly, hard to read but it does include the original 13th amendment, or the titles of nobility clause.  It\'s not a hoax & it hasn\'t been debunked like it says.
reviews.author: Marcos Cuevas

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Now I can show my brothers and sisters the rights they are promised which are being raped and stolen from them. We will be free again. \342\200\242]|[\342\200\242
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Oboma should read this
reviews.comment: If only our goverment would read this....local,state and fed.
reviews.author: eric graves

reviews.title: Thank you!!!
reviews.comment: this is a must have application and everybody should be reading this constantly but on top of that your removal of the permissions and advertisements makes this an amazing gift from you to the Android community and I, for one, greatly appreciate it! (P.S. if you would please consider making apps for the Federalist Papers and the Anti-Federalist papers I think it would also be incredible!)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Thank you for this app. It is exactly what I was looking for. Found it by happenstance. I guess I\'ll have to get the word out there. Once again thank you it\'s a wonderful layout
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: \342\230\205Reads phone state..& SD card!Not full disclosure... It accesses MORE than just Internet! Shame on you!

reviews.comment: Wonderful handy reference to have so I can show my son what a great country we used to have.
